summary: avian infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) remains a significant source of loss in the poultry industry. early diagnosis is required to prevent the disease from spreading. a total of 389 sera were tested against the rN in ELISA. the results of the ELISA-rN were compared with those obtained from a commercial kit. serum samples scored as negative with the commercial kit but as positive with the rN protein were further analysed by Western blot analyses.
